function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of containment measures for COVID-19","Impact":"Widespread transmission and high number of cases","Mitigation":"Implement specific methodologies for case identification, suppression, and resource provision","Technologies":"Integration of national health insurance database with immigration department, big data analytics, real-time warnings based on travel history and symptoms, scanning of QR codes, connected reporting of transport history, IoT devices","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate health management systems","Impact":"Difficulty in tracking and managing diseases","Mitigation":"Implement IoT-based health management systems for disease alerts and tracking","Technologies":"IoT devices, interconnected network, digital data capture","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"}]}
